channel.title: My Server issue's
channel.description:
Hi guy's thanks for stopping by,
now to get to the point
problem 1 )
No drops when you pk someone , i would also like to make it so players lose items when they die, if someone can explain that. im using a 525 source thanatos to be exact,
2) changing home area , i would like to change the home area to varrock west not sure how ,
3) glitchy prayer , Sometimes works sometimes dont, any input would be appreciated.
4) i want to make certain items unspawnable, any ideas. also if u can explain how to custom certain items, say ags so it hits more or something
thank's

item.title: My Server issue's
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

i know how to make it so ags hits higher, go to item.cfg then go to Armadyl Godsword, the 0 second to last is str bonus

Read full topic
